ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Proposal to change how bard haste songs stack with  enchanter/sham an haste spells
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Hmm. Maybe if you have a particularly bad connection. Otherwise, with the color line of stuns and mez an enchenter shouldn t have too much trouble
ygData.messageBody:
On Thu, Jan 11/01, "Kimes, Dean W." <dean_kimes@...> wrote:
> that's what I thought. The problem I encountered with mine was that one lag
> spike or disappearing mob and you died, period. They just don't have the
> hp's to survive getting caught by one of the charmee's I found. Our regular
> enchanter in the Armigers had even less luck charming than I did, probably
> due to not having to deal with it on a 12 second basis before ;-)

Hmm. Maybe if you have a particularly bad connection. Otherwise, with
the color line of stuns and mez an enchenter shouldn't have too much
trouble re-charming.
